title: #-# Lf players for my Clash Team Gold-Plat. Everyone welcome!
body:
Lf chilled and fun Gold-Plat players. No test games, just some warm up games before clash starts. Just add me 
IGN: 2Gundalf2

replies.body: Hi we are a top/jg and a mid main. i have sent you a friend request in game (IGN as displayed). Just hit me up if your interested.
